code: import React,{useEffect}from'react';import{useDispatch,useSelector}from'react-redux';import Bredcrumb from'src/components/core/Bredcrumb';import SearchField from'src/components/ecommerce/DefaultList/SearchField';import TableBody from'src/components/ecommerce/DefaultList/TableBody';import TableHeader from'src/components/ecommerce/DefaultList/TableHeader';import UpButton from'src/components/ecommerce/DefaultList/UpButton';import Pagination from'src/components/ecommerce/products/pagination';import{getCategories,deleteAProductCategory,resetState}from'src/features/pcategory/categorySlice';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CategoryList=()=>{const dispatch=useDispatch();useEffect(()=>{dispatch(resetState());dispatch(getCategories());},[]);const categoryState=useSelector(state=>state.categories.categories);const deleteCategory=e=>{dispatch(deleteAProductCategory(e));setTimeout(()=>{dispatch(getCategories());},100);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"content",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container-fluid",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Bredcrumb,{title:"Categories"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"row",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-12",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-body",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"row mb-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SearchField,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(UpButton,{buttonTitle:"Category",route:"add-category"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"table-responsive",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{className:"table table-centered table-nowrap mb-0",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableHeader,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableBody,{dataState:categoryState,sourceName:"product-category",performAction:deleteCategory})]})}),categoryState.length>10&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Pagination,{})]})})})})]})});};export default CategoryList;
